General.Name: Peel Hunt Ltd
General.Description: Peel Hunt Limited operates as a mid and small-cap focused investment bank in the United Kingdom. It operates through Investment Banking, Research & Distribution, and Execution Services segments. The Investment Banking segment provides equity and debt capital market advisory, private and retail capital markets, mergers and acquisitions, investor relations, debt advisory, private equity, debt advisory, and corporate broking services. The Research & Distribution segment offers trading platform services in various sectors. The Execution services segment provides dealing and execution services for institutional asset managers, registrars, private client wealth managers, and private banks. The company serves institutional clients, wealth managers, and private client brokers. The company was formerly known as PH Capital Limited and changed its name to Peel Hunt Limited in September 2021. Peel Hunt Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Saint Peter Port, Guernsey.
General.Address: Dorey Court, Saint Peter Port, Guernsey, GY1 2HT
